thread.title: Kaylee

author: Kaylee
title: Kaylee
text: The dress fits perfectly. I put my measurements into the system and it told me what size would be best (size 5) and it was dead on. The dress is long, but I'm 4'11, everything is long on me and the description said the model was 5'9, so that was helpful. The dress is beautiful and I couldn't be happier. The dress only took a couple of days and the shipping was free. So everything was perfect!
